message.entry: Patch embedding with patch size {0} and output size {1}
The input must be a scalar or a row vector.
Invalid input. The sizes of the spatial dimension must be greater than or equal to 1.
Invalid input. The size of the channel dimension must be greater than or equal to 1.
The number of spatial dimensions in the input ({0}) must match the number of elements in PatchSize ({1}).
Number of channels in the layer input ({0}) must match the layer expected number of channels ({1}).
Code generation for patchEmbeddingLayer only supports spatio-temporal inputs with fixed size time dimension.
